name: Dreamr
description:
We are Dreamr. An award-winning app development agency.
Dreamr believes technology has the power to inspire and enrich lives in a positive and meaningful way; our mission is to create the most innovative and thought-provoking products in the world – and your project is our canvas.
Based in the heart of Manchester, we design and develop mobile applications for iOS and Android – providing solutions for all types of business, from startups and entrepreneurs to enterprise.
